title: Scrapbook, 1899
medium:
Medium: silk
Technique: various weave structures
inscribed: in pencil on inside front, 'Fall 1899' note on last page of swatches, 'put a 3 ligne flounce on this and you have a later one.'
dimensions: Closed book: 36 x 30.5 x 9 cm (14 3/16 x 12 x 3 9/16 in. )
description: Scrapbook assembled in New York containing 780 examples of ribbon. Some colorways. Some topical subjects (a bicycle with a butterfly)

tombstone.epitaph:
Scrapbook, 1899. Medium: silk
Technique: various weave structures. 1967-54-23.
